name: Australis Chrome Style
description:
Some modifications of the theme created by SoapyHamHocks, making it closer to Google Chrome.

Screenshot: http://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/51879_after.jpeg

Step by step:

1. Download theme:
http://soapyhamhocks.deviantart.com/art/Australis-1-0a2-245477231?

IMPORTANT: Use Small icons.

2. Use these styles:
2.1. Hide Firefox app menu button on titlebar: http://userstyles.org/styles/41215/firefox-5-hide-firefox-app-menu-button-on-titlebar

2.2. Firefox 4 new bookmark star: http://userstyles.org/styles/35201/firefox-4-new-bookmark-star

2.3. Firefox 4 chrome like toolbarbuttons: http://userstyles.org/styles/42200/firefox-4-chrome-like-toolbarbuttons
additional_info:
Version 1.2
